modName: Custom Race Compatibility Template for Console Modders
summary:
Requires
-Dawnguard DLC

this is for modders who want a simple solution for console custom race porting scripts of course it wont work for ps4 cause of the custom scripts and the fact that i dont think there are going to be any true custom races on ps4
descriptionHtml:
Requires 
-Dawnguard DLC 

this is for modders who want a simple solution for console custom race porting scripts of course it wont work for ps4 cause of the custom scripts and the fact that i dont think there are going to be any true custom races on ps4 

-just follow the changes i made and youll be able to play custom races as vampires and vampire lords 

-i even added a template in this to show how and where to make it so the db questline can be finished without issues 

-just use your custom race and change the custom script name aaaCustomRace and aaaCustomRaceVampire to your custom races names and then it should be good to go for xbox one at least 


this is for those who would like to be able to create custom races that can do the vampire lord questline and be proper vampires without problems
author: Elfendrago
